summary: A replica Viking helmet with knotwork
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][size=120]Viking Helmet[/size][/u][/center]
Check out the modified version in the Vendel styles with the nasal guard! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15521

[b]Updated again![/b] The problem with the hole in the ear has been fixed by covering it with a bit of leather.

[b]Updated:[/b] I\'ve updated the model and added the \"Viking Helm\" as a craftable item. Variants of the Viking helmet are coming soon!

Model and texture created by artist Nate Hallahan of Hammerwing Studios.
This mod replaces the default iron helmet but can be changed to replace the helmet you want (by renaming the folders). It fits all humanoids (man, orc, elf), male and female.

This model and texture set can be used to create other mods as long as original credit is given and our Studio is notified at hammerwingstudios@gmail.com

This helm is being used in these other mods:	
Viking Armour and Weapons Compilation by Laz3456 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13150
author: Nate Hallahan of HammerWing Studios
